amendatorysection.catchline: Driving rules; publication; copy; available upon request.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The director shall publish on the website of the department a summary of the statutory driving rules of this state. Such summary shall contain cautionary and advisory comments as determined by the director, including a description of how to legally operate a motor vehicle in order to avoid arrest.
(2) The director may provide a copy of the summary described in subsection (1) of this section without charge upon request by a member of the public.
